de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore

Class DataReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.DataReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DataReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Representing a mini server listening to the given port for incoming connection. For every connection a DataReceiverConnection object is used to handle the incoming data.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    chrwuer

        encrpytionKey - the encryption key to be used

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes this object and immediately stops all Threads and ongoing transmissions. The ServerSocket used by this object will be closed and the port is reusable.
